com.jcodeing.kmedia

Interface IMediaPlayer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPlayerBase
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AMediaPlayer, AndroidMediaPlayer

    public interface IMediaPlayer
extends IPlayerBase
    All of the MediaPlayer interface.

    If you want to add new media player engine, can implement this interface or extends AMediaPlayer.
